Bacti-Cinerator Sterilizer YR05324,"Bacti-cinerator sterilizer is used for incineration and disinfection of small tools and bottles such as inoculation rings, inoculation needles, lab tweezers and triangle and tube mouth. It is easy to operate and widely used in the environment of biological safety cabinets, purification worktables, suction fans and mobile vehicles, etc.

\n
  • Ash organic material to prevent infectious splash and cross contamination

Glass Bead Sterilizer YR05326,"

Glass bead sterilizers are a quick, easy and accurate alternative to traditional methods of sterilization.
\nOnce switched 'ON', the units are ready to use within 25min and ensure total sterilization by destruction of all micro-organisms within 10 seconds.

\n
  • Glass bead sterilizers are a quick, easy and accurate alternative to traditional methods of sterilization.

\n
  • Once switched 'ON', the units are ready to use within 25 minutes and ensure total sterilization by destruction of all micro-organisms within 10 seconds.

\n
  • Glass bead sterilizers are incorporated with an imported thermostat, which heats the highest temperature with 300℃ in 25m in, these units having a stainless steel body, are compact enough to be placed on any Laminar air flow work benches or any other workside tables in a clean room atmosphere.
\n<table dir=""ltr"" border=""1"" cellspacing=""0"" cellpadding=""0""><colgroup> <col width=""200"" /> <col width=""164"" /></colgroup>

\n
  • Glass bead sterilizers are a quick, easy and accurate alternative to traditional methods of sterilization.

\n
  • Once switched 'ON', the units are ready to use within 25min and ensure total sterilization by destruction of all micro-organisms within 10 seconds.

\n
  • Glass bead sterilizers are incorporated with an imported thermostat, which heats the highest temperature with 300°C in 25m in, these units having a stainless steel body, are compact enough to be placed on any Laminar air flow work benches or any other workside tables in a clean room atmosphere.
\n<table dir=""ltr"" border=""1"" cellspacing=""0"" cellpadding=""0""><colgroup> <col width=""200"" /> <col width=""173"" /></colgroup>

\n
  • Wide range of applications (inoculating loop, inoculating needle or culture tube mouth)

column1: Bacti-Cinerator and Sterilizer YR405,"YR405 glass bead sterilizers are incorporated with an imported thermostat, which heats to the highest temperature with 300 in 25 m, these units with a stainless steel body, are compact enough to be placed on any laminar air flow workbench or any other workbench in a clean room environment. YR405 is a fast, easy and accurate alternative to traditional sterilization methods. Once switched on, the units are ready to use within 25 minutes and ensure total sterilization by destroying all microorganisms within 10 seconds.
